comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content: This must have been very precious to him, it has been repaired instead of discarded when it ripped.

comment.author: 10530558@N03
comment._content: It's a sad thought that this was a trophy... a touching thought that he had it in his hand to the last...

comment.author: 9237372@N08
comment._content: This was probably a remembrance sent to the soldier by his wife, sweetheart or mother from back home. Such things magnify the atrocity of war.
